sections.heading: officers; vacancy.Vacancies in each school district office shall occur as set forth in section 32-570 and be filled according to such section

sections.text:
79-545.District officers; vacancy.

Vacancies in each school district office shall occur as set forth in section 32-570 and be filled according to such section.

SourceLaws 1881, c. 78, subdivision V, § 10, p. 354;R.S.1913, § 6790;C.S.1922, § 6331;C.S.1929, § 79-510;R.S.1943, § 79-510;Laws 1949, c. 256, § 101, p. 726;Laws 1951, c. 276, § 5, p. 930;Laws 1953, c. 291, § 4, p. 990;R.S.1943, (1987), § 79-462;Laws 1994, LB 76, § 596;R.S.1943, (1994), § 79-467.01;Laws 1996, LB 900, § 298.
